titles.title: Nageki no Bourei wa Intai shitai: Saijaku Hunter ni Yoru Saikyou Party Ikuseijutsu
嘆きの亡霊は引退したい ～最弱ハンターによる最強パーティ育成術～
Let This Grieving Soul Retire! Woe Is the Weakling Who Leads the Strongest Party

title: Nageki no Bourei wa Intai shitai: Saijaku Hunter ni Yoru Saikyou Party Ikuseijutsu
title_english: Let This Grieving Soul Retire! Woe Is the Weakling Who Leads the Strongest Party
title_japanese: 嘆きの亡霊は引退したい ～最弱ハンターによる最強パーティ育成術～
synopsis:
It's the golden age of treasure hunters who seek wealth, honor, power and glory, and explore treasures around the world without regard to danger. "Let's become treasure hunters," said Kurai Andolihy, who swore an oath with his childhood friends to become the strongest... but he discovered during his first quest that he has no talent. But that was only the beginning of his adventure.

"I can't do this anymore. I want to quit."
"Oh, I see. In other words, we should fight harder and cover for you, that's a good handicap."
"Rest assured, Kurai. We'll protect you!"
"Oh, wait. If you step on that, the trap will destroy you without leaving a speck of dust behind. Be careful, Leader!"

Protected by his overpowered childhood friends, sought out by newbies and nobles, they aim to be heroes and find powerful treasures. Will Kruai really be able to retire safely from being a treasure hunter?

(Source: Kadokawa/Shousetsuka ni Narou, translated)
background: Nageki no Bourei wa Intai shitai: Saijaku Hunter ni Yoru Saikyou Party Ikuseijutsu has been published in English as Let This Grieving Soul Retire! Woe Is the Weakling Who Leads the Strongest Party by Yen Press since December 21, 2021.
